title: cryptic error message when user uploads file after encryption is enabled
body:
expected behavior:
proper error message appears telling user to log out and log back in prior to uploading or editing files

actual behavior:
cryptic message appears for seconds.  the message is at the top of the browser and small and not easily noticeable.


![issue1](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5174383/950787/308f8fa6-0395-11e3-96f1-f6f9c8df5820.png)

 

steps to reproduce
1.	admin user is logged into owncloud.  at same time other users are logged in
2.	admin user enables encryption app.  the encryption app says â€œafter the app was enabled you need to re-login and initialize your encryption keysâ€?
3.	admin knows to re-login but other users do not
4.	non-admin users attempt to upload a file and get error
5.	non-admin users attempt to edit a text file already on the system, press the â€œsaveâ€? button, the message hangs at â€œsavingâ€¦â€? and never saves successfully.  never provides any error.
